description:
_Pro Tools 10 Essential Training_ with musician and producer David Franz
illuminates the process of recording, editing, mixing, and mastering in Avid
Pro Tools, the industry-standard software for music and postproduction. The
course covers recording live audio and adding effects on the fly, creating
music with virtual instruments and plug-ins, editing for time and pitch
manipulation, creating a musical score, and mixing and mastering a track.
title: Pro Tools 10 Essential Training
